document_data.caption: Sszaryn under the effects of ''[[speak with dead]]''.
document_data.name: Sszaryn
document_data.deathnotes: killed in a raid on [[Waukeen's Rest]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Sszaryn''' was a [[drow]] from [[Sshamath]] that joined the [[Cult of the Absolute]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Sszaryn was among the devotees of [[the Absolute]] tasked with abducting Grand Duke [[Ulder Ravengard]] from [[Waukeen's Rest]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. While the cultists burned down the inn and managed to capture Ravengard, Sszaryn and several others in their group were slain by the contingent of [[Flaming Fist]] soldiers staying within. Sszaryn was shot down by an [[archer]] from the inn's rooftop.
